title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 156.1 - Statement of policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 156.1 - Statement of policy

State Regulations

On May 14, 1985 New York State and District Council 37 signed
a collective bargaining agreement for the period April 1, 1985 through March
31, 1988 covering employees in the Rent Regulation Services Negotiating Unit, which provides in part that the State develop a performance evaluation
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
156.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
